title: Amazon’s ad-supported iMDb TV will be rebranded ‘Amazon Freevee’ later this month
content:
Ad-supported streaming services have a limited barrier of entry, and Amazon’s iMDb TV service has offered a solid catalog and wide availability across Google TV and various other platforms. Now, Amazon has announced that iMDb TV will become “Freevee” this month.

more…

The post Amazon’s ad-supported iMDb TV will be rebranded ‘Amazon Freevee’ later this month appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Amazon is shaking up its ad-supported streaming service, with "Freevee" replacing iMDb TV later this month ahead of new content.
